Elita:

"What will happen now? What happened with Tucson and uncle kup?"sai=
d cusious the little child


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Sunday, March 21,=
 2010 3:41 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Back to the Ark


  =

> OOC: Tucson and Night Shift are still within the vicinity of the Ark, bu=
t just about a hundred to two hundred feet away. They didn't get far before=
 they started to battle, yet Nightshift was transmitting a message to Hydra=
s. His transmission range is extensive.

OOC: Thanks, I appreciate the info=
 :)

> BIC: Tucson makes for a make shift, mid transformation sequence, as =
instructed by Lord Elder.
>
> "Sorry about that Sir, I shouldn't have assum=
ed you had the capability. You're right, this should be convincing enough."=

>
> Half robot, half SUV, Tucson now falls to the ground, as if going unco=
ncious. Walking further ahead, with a slow limp, Night Shift puts a little =
distance between himself and Tucson before falling painfully to the ground,=
 waiting for help to arrive.

Lord Elder acknowledged Tuscon's transmission=
 with a single stroke on
the terminal. there was something funny about that=
 dot that
periodically appeared. For the moment it disappeared again, proba=
bly
because it had stopped moving again. His computer instruments were
pick=
ing up just barely, it was only the very slightest of distortions.

He glan=
ced over at Elita, "Yes" he said distractedly, "A hologram. But
I don't hav=
e one. But maybe we all could build one later." he said as
he watched the s=
creen as his radar began picking up Scorponok's
approach, "Oh boy, here it =
goes" he mumbled under his breath again.

*********************************=
**********

Meanwhile . . .

Scorponok began his approach, his robot mode c=
learly visible. Like
many of the earlier built Decepticons, he had the abil=
ity to fly in
robot mode. Typically he saw no need to use it, but there wer=
e times
when it was useful, such as now.

As Nightshift moved across the gr=
ound, Scorponok moved in his
direction, his larger frame and massive dimens=
ion dwarfing your more
typical and even most of your larger framed mechs.

=
With a deft use of boosters he landed on the ground a few meters in
front o=
f Nightshift and looked around. He looked over at Tuscon's
apparently broke=
n form in the distance. "Interesting." he said as he
turned his gaze on the=
 approaching Nightshift. "Tuscon fell much
easier to you than he did to the=
 others." Scorponok said thoughtfully,
conveniently obscuring the fact that=
 he was there too.

"Hydras wants to see you." he said, his voice deep and =
somewhat firm,
holding out a large clawed hand to steady Nightshift should =
he need
it.

(TAG)

OOC: Keep in mind, due to the information being sent to=
 Cyclonus,
Hydras and anyone else in the command center can see and hear wh=
at is
going on here.

Preston
